name: Horizons
description:
Horizons is a short flight-sim demo. It features proper lift and drag effects, flaps, VTOL, airbrakes, and landing gears (although when retracted they only reduce drag, and don't actually affect ground physics)

You can use either a controller or keyboard + mouse to control the craft. To show the full control list, press esc in the game to pause it, and see the controls and a short explanation.

This is still a work in progress game, so expect things to change!

Note: Linux version is untested
